infos.value: The alliance between Hourne and Fennes will be tested if Machérie refuses to wed...
Naught will come of it. The alliance is not so fragile.
How can you be so sure...?
Not a fortnight has passed since the daughter of King Muraga of Fennes...
Unbelievable... You mean to say this daughter has wed Prince Dario?
Unsettling words. Mention of a daughter had not even crossed into my kingdom...
Lady Machérie, your purity misleads you. You gift them too much faith...
We speak naught but the truth!
Perhaps...but in Hourne, Lady Vinera has already...
That cur Muraga... What in the world is he planning?
